Title: Requires the department of transportation to mark certain potholes during paving projects
Summary: Requires the department of transportation to mark any pothole deeper than one inch located in the area of any street paving project undertaken by the department with fluorescent paint.
LawCode: Add ยง19-116.1, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of transportation to mark certain potholes during paving projects
